entry.def: Spanish means belonging or relating to Spain, or to its people, language, or culture.
Spanish is the main language spoken in Spain, and in many countries in South and Central America.
The Spanish are the people who come from Spain.

means.word_mean: 1. the Romance language spoken in most of Spain and the countries colonized by Spain
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Spain or the people of Spain;
